page.title: 02Cinque Ports contd.
page.content: The procession starts at{St. James {Church}and they walk through the town to the town hall to talk to the council.The person who leads the procession is the sergeant (who has very excpensive shoes)also there are the{Freemen of Brightlingsea}and the Deputy's six assistants. The{Deputy of Brightlingsea}does all sorts of things for the old people in Brightlingsea, for example in the summer he takes them for a ride in the country and at Christmas he gives them each a present and a Christmas dinner.
